author: AndrewLevin
body:
This is a backport of pull request https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24763 which updates the POWHEG EmissionVeto1 userhook for the WGamma special case.

This was already backported to 71X (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24828) for 2016 MC production, but we would also like to use it for 2017 MC production.
title: Backport of POWHEG EmissionVeto1 updates to 93X
